product_name: Teentumn 30oz Sport Water Bottle with Time Markers, Large Durable Gym Plastic Bottle Tritan BPA Free for Fitness, Outdoor Enthusiasts, Leakproof Clear (Pack of 1)
description: Meet Water Needs of Your Body Everyday - With the newly designed time marker, Teentumn 30oz plastic water bottle provide an easy way to track water consumption and remind you dink enough water. Healthier Drinking - Made from 100% BPA and toxin free Tritan co-polyester plastic to ensure that water is SAFE to your body and environmentally friendly. Triple Watertight Protection - The drinking cap, secure lid lock and the seal ring between the cap and the mouth ensure no leakage even Inadvertently falling on the ground. Enjoying Fruit Water Through Removable Filter - Put the smaller pieces of Fruit will provide a more intense flavor which helps flush toxins from your system, helps to improve digestion and makes you feel full to combat unhealthy snacking. Take it Anywhere You Go - Suitable for All Kinds of Outdoor and Indoor Activities. Enhance your health and feel stronger and energized with the help of the Teentumn portable water bottle!

latest_reviews.review: Love it. Great price. Lightweight. Perfect size. Exactly what I was looking for. Would definitely buy again.
